meanings.definition: A game of chance in which each player has a card with numbers on it and the caller announces numbers drawn from a container
meanings.sent1: During the family gathering, we played bingo and had so much fun!
meanings.sent2: Let's play bingo at the party this weekend.
meanings.sent3: The bingo game got intense when Grandma won three rounds in a row!
meanings.sent4: In the game of life, sometimes it feels like we're all just players waiting for our bingo numbers to be called.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the bingo balls bouncing in the container added excitement to the room.

meanings.definition: Used to express satisfaction or triumph when one achieves something or finds what one is looking for
meanings.sent1: Bingo! I finally found my missing sock under the bed.
meanings.sent2: When the team scored the winning goal, the coach shouted 'bingo!' in celebration.
meanings.sent3: After hours of searching, I shouted 'bingo!' when I discovered my keys in the jacket pocket.
meanings.sent4: The detective exclaimed 'bingo!' when he cracked the case wide open.
meanings.sent5: With a triumphant smile, she exclaimed 'bingo!' as she completed the puzzle.
